remarks: Partial converse to ~ bezout .  Existence of a linear combination does not set the GCD, but it does upper bound it.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Sep-2014.)
statement: bezoutr $p |- ( ( ( A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ ) /\ ( X e. ZZ /\ Y e. ZZ ) ) -> ( A gcd B ) || ( ( A x. X ) + ( B x. Y ) ) ) $.
